name: Space Trash (Junk Space)
description:
The Galaxy needs a Hero! Thanks god, it's only one call away. And that person is… Space Janitor!

Arm yourself with the Black Hole and save the Universe from garbage. However, remember, one planet's trash is another planet's ecosystem. Try not to kill inhabitants and clean the Galaxy till it’s shine!

  • Each planet has its own rules and odds
  • Finally cleaning is fun
  • Hilarious story
  • Challenging but fun controls

Now get to the action!
